Description.Name: There be BattleMechs, Swabby
Description.Details: While your last raid concluded hours ago, you've barely made a dent in sifting through the spoils. You stand on the far side of the Argo's 'Mech Bay, tapping entries into a datapad as all hands ferry weaponry, shells, and slabs of BattleMech armor off the carcasses of your rivals' 'Mechs. "Hey, Boss," comes Yang's voice. You look up from the pad and see him walking over, wiping greasy hands on a rag at his belt. "One of these 'Mechs is in pretty good shape. We could get her runnin' again instead of needing to salvage her."

Description.Name: CommanderGearLoot
Description.Details:
You nod in the affirmative. "Sounds good to me. Let's see exactly what old Bobbert was throwing at us."

Readying the 'Mech takes another few hours, as Yang tosses out wrecked components and complains about "inelegant" workmanship. The irony is apparently lost on him as he crams the chassis full of rat's nests of his own design.
